document.discussion_title: FinnCap Reaffirms “Corporate” Rating for Gresham House Strategic PLC (GHS)
document.topic_text: Tweet FinnCap reaffirmed their corporate rating on shares of Gresham House Strategic PLC (LON:GHS) in a research report report published on Tuesday morning. They currently have a GBX 1,000 ($12.88) price objective on the stock. Shares of Gresham House Strategic PLC ( LON:GHS ) opened at 835.00 on Tuesday. Gresham House Strategic PLC has a 1-year low of GBX 7.60 and a 1-year high of GBX 843.50. The stock’s market cap is GBX 30.79 million. The stock’s 50 day moving average is GBX 9.83 and its 200-day moving average is GBX 9.70. Gresham House Strategic plc, formerly SPARK Ventures plc, is a United Kingdom-based investment company. The Company invests primarily in the United Kingdom and European public companies, applying private equity techniques and due diligence alongside a value investment philosophy to construct a portfolio. Gresham House Strategic PLC Gresham House Strategic PLC
